summary.span: 表示 控制項中的節點。

span.span: Represents a node in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項所組成的節點。The control is made up of nodes. 在樹狀目錄中的每個項目稱為一個節點，而由物件。Each entry in the tree is called a node and is represented by a object. 包含其他節點的節點稱為*父節點*。A node that contains other nodes is called a *parent node*. 所包含的另一個節點的節點稱為*子節點*。A node that is contained by another node is called a *child node*. 沒有子節點的節點稱為*分葉節點*。A node that has no child nodes is called a *leaf node*. 不包含的任何其他節點，但不是所有其他節點上的階節點是*根節點*。A node that is not contained by any other node but is the ancestor to all the other nodes is the *root node*. 節點可以是父代和子系，但根，父代，而且分葉節點為互斥。A node can be both a parent and a child, but root, parent, and leaf nodes are mutually exclusive. 節點的數個視覺和行為屬性由節點是*根*，*父*，或*分葉*節點。Several visual and behavioral properties of nodes are determined by whether a node is a *root*, *parent*, or *leaf* node. 雖然一般樹狀只能有一個根節點，控制項可讓您將多個根節點加入至樹狀結構。Although a typical tree has only one root node, the control allows you to add multiple root nodes to your tree structure. 當您想要顯示項目清單，而不會顯示單一的主要根節點，例如產品類別目錄的清單，這非常有用。This is useful when you want to display item listings without displaying a single main root node, as in a list of product categories. 節點主要是將資料儲存在兩個屬性：屬性和屬性。A node primarily stores data in two properties, the property and the property. 值屬性顯示在控制項，而屬性用來儲存任何相關的節點，例如用來處理回傳事件資料的其他資料。The value of the property is displayed in the control, and the property is used to store any additional data about the node, such as data used for handling postback events. 節點也會儲存從節點到根節點中的路徑屬性。A node also stores the path from the node to its root node in the property. 屬性會指出相對於根節點的節點的位置。The property indicates the node's position relative to the root node. > [!NOTE] > 在相同層級的節點每個值必須是唯一的屬性;控制項無法區別相同層級具有相同的值的不同節點。Nodes at the same level must each have a unique value for the property; the control cannot distinguish between different nodes at the same level that have the same value. 在此案例中，如果使用者有重複的值，節點的節點，出現在第一個選取控制項。In this scenario, if the user clicks a node that has a duplicate value, the node that appears first in the control is selected. A物件由下列四個使用者介面 (UI) 項目，可以進行自訂或隱藏所組成：A object is made up of the following four user interface (UI) elements, which can be customized or hidden: - 展開節點指標圖示用來顯示節點是否已展開、 摺疊，或無法展開。An expansion node indicator icon used to show whether the node is expanded, collapsed, or non-expandable. - 與節點相關聯選擇性核取方塊。An optional check box associated with the node. - 選擇性節點映像。An optional node image. - 節點文字。The node text. 您可以設定來指定自訂映像可展開、 摺疊，且無法展開節點指標， ，和屬性類別。You can specify a custom image for the expandable, collapsible, and non-expandable node indicators by setting the , , and properties of the class. 展開節點的指標圖示甚至可以隱藏完全是藉由設定屬性類別`false`。The expansion node indicator icons can even be hidden entirely by setting the property of the class to `false`. 若要顯示節點旁邊的核取方塊，設定屬性類別。To display a check box next to a node, set the property of the class. 當以外屬性設定為值`TreeNodeType.Node`，指定的節點型別旁顯示核取方塊。When the property is set to a value other than `TreeNodeType.Node`, check boxes are displayed next to the specified node type. 您可以選擇性地覆寫個別節點的核取方塊設定節點的屬性。You can selectively override the check box of an individual node by setting the node's property. 顯示核取方塊時，使用屬性來判斷是否已經選取核取方塊。When a check box is displayed, use the property to determine whether the check box is selected. 您可以藉由設定節點中顯示映像屬性。You can display an image in a node by setting the property. 節點文字旁邊會顯示這個影像。This image is displayed next to the node text. 在節點的文字控制項可以處於兩種模式： 選取範圍模式或瀏覽模式。The text of a node in the control can be in one of two modes: selection mode or navigation mode. 根據預設，節點處於選取模式。By default, a node is in selection mode. 將節點放入瀏覽模式中，設定節點的屬性為空字串以外的值 ("")。To put a node into navigation mode, set the node's property to a value other than an empty string (""). 節點處於選取模式，將節點設定屬性設為空字串。To put a node into selection mode, set the node's property to an empty string. > [!NOTE] > 某些網際網路瀏覽器有可能會影響效能的限制控制項。Some Internet browsers have a limitation that can affect the performance of the control. 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 6.0 有回傳的 2067年字元的 URL 字元限制。For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 6.0 has a URL character limit of 2067 characters that it posts. 如果節點的 URL 中的字元數大於此數目，展開該節點將會失敗並擲回任何例外狀況。If the number of characters in a URL of a node is larger than that number, expanding that node will fail and no exception is thrown. 根據預設，按一下 節點處於選取模式張貼頁面回傳至伺服器並引發事件。By default, clicking a node that is in selection mode posts the page back to the server and raises the event. 您可以選擇指定不同的事件，藉由設定的節點來引發`SelectAction`屬性。You can optionally specify a different event to raise by setting the node's `SelectAction` property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 若要判斷已按下哪個節點處於選取模式，請使用屬性控制項。To determine which node was clicked in selection mode, use the property of the control. 瀏覽模式中的節點時，該節點會停用選取範圍的所有事件。When a node is in navigation mode, all selection events are disabled for that node. 按一下瀏覽模式中的節點會引導使用者指定的 URL。Clicking the node in navigation mode directs the user to the specified URL. 您可以選擇設定屬性，以指定的視窗或框架，在其中顯示連結的內容。You can optionally set the property to specify the window or frame in which to display the linked content. 類別包含數個屬性，用來儲存節點的狀態。The class contains several properties that are used to store the state of the node. 使用屬性來判斷是否已選取的節點。Use the property to determine whether a node is selected. 若要判斷是否已展開節點，請使用屬性。To determine whether the node is expanded, use the property. 屬性用來判斷是否繫結至資料的節點。The property is used to determine whether a node is bound to data. 當節點繫結至資料時，您可以使用來存取基礎資料的項目屬性。When a node is bound to data, you can access the underlying data item by using the property. 這個類別會提供數個屬性，協助您判定相對於其他節點的節點在樹狀目錄中的位置。The class provides several properties that help to determine the position of a node relative to other nodes in the tree. 使用屬性來判斷節點的深度。Use the property to determine the depth of the node. 您可以取得分隔的節點清單目前節點的根節點使用屬性。You can get the delimited list of nodes from the current node to its root node by using the property. 若要判斷節點的父節點，請使用屬性。To determine the node's parent node, use the property. 使用存取子節點集合。Child nodes are accessed using the collection. 某些情況下，它並不實用靜態地預先定義的資料大小，或根據使用者輸入的自訂內容的樹狀結構。Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input. 因為這個緣故，控制項支援動態節點母體擴展。Because of this, the control supports dynamic node population. 節點可以在執行階段展開時填入。A node can be populated at run time when it is expanded. 請注意，您就可以取得非預期的行為，是否您將保存以非同步方式建立的節點。Note that you can get unexpected behavior if you persist asynchronously created nodes. 例如，如果您使用背景工作執行緒非同步地擴展節點時，節點樹狀結構可能不會填入立即雖然控制項繼續處理其餘的頁面生命週期。For example, if you use a background worker thread to populate nodes asynchronously, the node tree might not be populated immediately though the control proceeds with the rest of the page life cycle. 在回傳時，延遲的建立的節點可能會造成問題，當控制項的檢視狀態載入，但尚未完全擴展節點樹狀結構。On postback, the delayed creation of the nodes can cause problems when the control's view state is loaded but the node tree is not fully populated. 如需有關動態節點母體擴展的詳細資訊，請參閱屬性。For more information on dynamic node population, see the property. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定下一個程式碼範例中的框架。The following code example demonstrates how to set up the frames for the next code example. MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Expanded As Nullable(Of Boolean)
public: property Nullable<bool> Expanded { Nullable<bool> get(); void set(Nullable<bool> value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示節點是否已展開。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the node is expanded.

value.span: 如果節點已展開則為 ；如果節點未展開則為 ；或是 。

span.span: if the node is expanded, if the node is not expanded, or .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用屬性來指定，或判斷是否已展開節點。Use the property to specify or determine whether the node is expanded. 您可以展開和摺疊節點，藉由呼叫和方法，分別。You can expand and collapse a node by calling the and methods, respectively. 您也可以展開和摺疊節點及其所有子節點，藉由呼叫和方法，分別。You can also expand and collapse a node and all its child nodes by calling the and methods, respectively. 因為屬性是三種狀態的屬性，下列 C# 程式碼片段會導致編譯錯誤：Since the property is a tri-state property, the following C# code snippet causes a compile error: ``` protected void TreeView1_SelectedNodeChanged(object sender, EventArgs e) { if (TreeView1.Nodes[0].Expanded) { // some work here } } ``` 雖然 VB.Net 隱含地將轉換`Boolean`值設定為`NullableBoolean`，C# 則否。While VB.Net implicitly casts the `Boolean` value to a `NullableBoolean`, C# does not. 因此，很明確檢查屬性狀態的最佳作法。Therefore, it is a best practice to explicitly check the state of the property. 例如，Visual Basic 和 C# 中的下列程式碼範例會明確地測試的值屬性。For example, the following code examples in Visual Basic and C# explicitly test the value of the property. 下列 Visual Basic 程式碼範例會明確地測試的值屬性。The following Visual Basic code example explicitly tests the value of the property. 這個範例會測試屬性設定為`True`; 因此`Nothing`和`False`落入`If`陳述式。This example tests if the property is set to `True`; therefore `Nothing` and `False` fall through the `If` statement. ``` If TreeView1.Nodes(0).Expanded = True Then 'some work hereEnd IF ``` 這個 C# 程式碼範例會明確地測試的值屬性。This C# code example explicitly tests the value of the property. 這個範例會測試屬性設定為`True`; 因此`Null`和`False`落入`If`陳述式。This example tests if the property is set to `True`; therefore `Null` and `False` fall through the `If` statement. ``` if( TreeView1.Nodes[0].Expanded == true ) { //some work here} ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用要以程式設計方式展開的節點屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically expand a node. 它會初始化所有的節點為展開狀態的其中一個的深度。It initializes all nodes with a depth of one to an expanded state. 請注意，展開根節點時，它的子節點已展開。Notice that when the root node is expanded, its child nodes are already expanded. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製下列 XML 資料範例為 Book.xml 的檔案。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Book.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeExpanded#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeExpanded/CS/treenodeexpandedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeExpanded#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeExpanded/VB/treenodeexpandedvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼是前述範例的範例 XML 資料。The following code is sample XML data for the previous example. ```
```

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用屬性來指定目前的節點中的自訂映像控制項。Use the property to specify a custom image for the current node in the control. 此映像之節點旁會顯示，而且只要用戶端瀏覽器支援的格式可以是任何檔案格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp 等等）。This image is displayed next to the node and can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client's browser supports that format. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性節點提供的自訂映像。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to provide a custom image for a node. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製下列 XML 資料範例為 Book.xml 的檔案。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Book.xml. remarks.format: ## Remarks 節點的文字可以是兩種模式的其中之一： 選取範圍模式或瀏覽模式。The text of a node can be in one of two modes: selection mode or navigation mode. 根據預設，節點處於選取模式。By default, a node is in selection mode. 將節點放入瀏覽模式中，設定節點的屬性為空字串以外的值。To put a node into navigation mode, set the node's property to a value other than an empty string. 瀏覽模式中的節點時，該節點會停用選取範圍的所有事件。When a node is in navigation mode, all selection events are disabled for that node. 按一下瀏覽模式中的節點會將使用者連結至指定的 URL。Clicking the node in navigation mode links the user to the specified URL. 您可以選擇設定屬性，以指定的視窗或框架，在其中顯示連結的內容。You can optionally set the property to specify the window or frame in which to display the linked content. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定下一個程式碼範例中的框架。The following code example demonstrates how to set up the frames for the next code example. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewFrameSet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewFrameSet/CS/framecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewFrameSet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewFrameSet/VB/framevb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要在按下的節點時，連結至 URL。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the URL to link to when the node is clicked. 這個範例用來顯示資料表的內容框架組的上一個範例。This example is used within the frameset of the previous example to display a table of contents. remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些情況下，它並不實用靜態地預先定義的資料大小，或根據使用者輸入的自訂內容的樹狀結構。Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input. 因為這個緣故，控制項支援動態節點母體擴展。Because of this, the control supports dynamic node population. 當節點的屬性設定為`true`，該節點會填入執行階段，透過展開節點時有回傳事件。When a node's property is set to `true`, that node is populated at run time through a postback event when the node is expanded. 若要以動態方式填入節點，節點會填入事件處理方法必須定義事件。To populate a node dynamically, an event-handling method that populates the node must be defined for the event. 支援的瀏覽器也可以利用用戶端節點母體擴展。Supported browsers can also take advantage of client-side node population. 啟用時，這可讓控制項以動態地填入用戶端上的節點，展開該節點時，這會避免需回傳至伺服器。When enabled, this allows the control to dynamically populate a node on the client when that node is expanded, which prevents the need to post back to the server. 如需有關用戶端節點母體擴展的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on client-side node population, see . 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性表示節點以動態方式擴展。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to indicate that a node is populated dynamically. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient/CS/treeviewpopulatenodesfromclientcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient/VB/treeviewpopulatenodesfromclientvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在節點的文字控制項可以處於兩種模式： 選取範圍模式或瀏覽模式。The text of a node in the control can be in one of two modes: selection mode or navigation mode. 根據預設，節點處於選取模式。By default, a node is in selection mode. 將節點放入瀏覽模式中，設定節點的屬性為空字串以外的值 ("")。To put a node into navigation mode, set the node's property to a value other than an empty string (""). 節點處於選取模式，將節點設定屬性設為空字串。To put a node into selection mode, set the node's property to an empty string. > [!NOTE] > 瀏覽模式中的節點時，該節點會停用選取事件。When a node is in navigation mode, selection events are disabled for that node. 按一下節點會將使用者導向至指定的 URL，而不是張貼頁面回傳至伺服器和引發事件。Clicking a node will direct the user to the specified URL, rather than posting the page back to the server and raising an event. 當節點處於選取模式時，使用屬性來指定選取的節點時引發的事件。When a node is in selection mode, use the property to specify which event or events are raised when a node is selected. 下表列出可用的選項。The following table lists the available options. |選取動作Selection action|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.Expand`|切換展開或摺疊節點。Toggles the node between expanded and collapsed. 引發事件或適當的事件。Raises the event or the event as appropriate.| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`|選取節點時，不引發任何事件。Raises no events when a node is selected.| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.Select`|選取節點時，引發 事件。Raises the event when a node is selected.| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.SelectExpand`|引發兩者和選取節點時的事件。Raises both the and the events when a node is selected. 只會展開節點，而不會摺疊。Nodes are only expanded, never collapsed.| > [!NOTE] > 屬性則不會與節點的方式呈現其屬性設定為`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`。The property is not rendered for a node with its property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定在按下一個節點時，會引發的事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which event is raised when a node is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient/CS/treeviewpopulatenodesfromclientcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient/VB/treeviewpopulatenodesfromclientvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks 控制項可讓您顯示節點的映像旁邊的核取方塊。The control allows you to display a check box next to a node's image. 使用屬性，即可顯示或隱藏目前節點的核取方塊。Use the property to show or hide the check box for the current node. 雖然屬性可以用來顯示核取方塊，就更常使用屬性控制項。Although the property can be used to display check boxes, it is more common to use the property of the control. 屬性，不過，會影響屬性; 指定的每個節點型別因此屬性通常用來覆寫該設定的個別節點。The property, however, affects every node type specified by the property; therefore, the property is often used to override that setting for an individual node. 因為屬性是三種狀態的屬性，下列 C# 程式碼片段會導致編譯錯誤：Since the property is a tri-state property, the following C# code snippet causes a compile error: ``` protected void TreeView1_SelectedNodeChanged(object sender, EventArgs e) { if (TreeView1.Nodes[0].Expanded) { // some work here } } ``` 雖然 VB.Net 隱含地將轉換`Boolean`值設定為`NullableBoolean`，C# 則否。While VB.Net implicitly casts the `Boolean` value to a `NullableBoolean`, C# does not. 因此，很明確檢查屬性狀態的最佳作法。Therefore, it is a best practice to explicitly check the state of the property. 例如，Visual Basic 和 C# 中的下列程式碼範例會明確地測試的值屬性。For example, the following code examples in Visual Basic and C# explicitly test the value of the property. 下列 Visual Basic 程式碼範例會明確地測試的值屬性。The following Visual Basic code example explicitly tests the value of the property. 這個範例會測試屬性設定為`True`; 因此`Nothing`和`False`落入`If`陳述式。This example tests if the property is set to `True`; therefore `Nothing` and `False` fall through the `If` statement. ``` If TreeView1.Nodes(0).Expanded = True Then 'some work hereEnd IF ``` 這個 C# 程式碼範例會明確地測試的值屬性。This C# code example explicitly tests the value of the property. 這個範例會測試屬性設定為`True`; 因此`Null`和`False`落入`If`陳述式。This example tests if the property is set to `True`; therefore `Null` and `False` fall through the `If` statement. ``` if( TreeView1.Nodes[0].Expanded == true ) { //some work here} ``` 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來以程式設計方式顯示和隱藏核取方塊中的節點屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically show and hide the check box for a node in the control. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製下列 XML 資料範例為 Book.xml 的檔案。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Book.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeShowCheckBox#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeShowCheckBox/CS/treenodeshowcheckboxcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeShowCheckBox#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeShowCheckBox/VB/treenodeshowcheckboxvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼是前述範例的範例 XML 資料。The following code is sample XML data for the previous example. ```
```

summary.span: 取得或設定其中要顯示與節點關聯之 Web 網頁內容的目標視窗或框架。

value.span: 除了以底線為開頭的某些特殊值以外，值必須以 A 到 Z (不區分大小寫) 範圍內的字母為開頭，如下表所示。

span.span: Values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case-insensitive), except for certain special values that begin with an underscore, as shown in the following table.

item.description: 呈現在新視窗中沒有框架的內容。
Renders the content in a new window without frames.
呈現父代的 即時運算框架組中的內容。
Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.
轉譯 [搜尋] 窗格中的內容。
Renders the content in the search pane.
呈現具有焦點的框架中的內容。
Renders the content in the frame with focus.
呈現框架不完整的視窗中的內容。
Renders the content in the full window without frames.

para.span: 請查閱您的瀏覽器文件，以判斷是否支援 值。

span.span: Check your browser documentation to determine whether the value is supported.

para.span: 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 (含) 以後版本支援 目標值。

span.span: For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the target value.

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，會重新整理擁有焦點的視窗或框架。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which refreshes the window or frame with focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的視窗或框架，以顯示 Web 內容會連結至節點，按一下該節點時。Use the property to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content linked to a node when that node is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 設定此屬性會覆寫屬性控制項。Setting this property overrides the property of the control. > [!NOTE] > 屬性轉譯成`target`屬性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. `target`屬性`anchor`XHTML 1.1 文件類型定義中不允許項目。The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 請勿設定屬性如果轉譯的輸出為物件必須是 XHTML 1.1 相容。Do not set the property if the rendered output for the object must be XHTML 1.1-compliant. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XHTML 標準，在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > > 在建立可存取網頁時，強烈建議您避免使用指向另一個視窗中的屬性。When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended you avoid using the property to target another window. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB: ASP.NET 網頁可及性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae)。For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae). 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定下一個範例的框架。The following code example demonstrates how to set up the frames for the next example. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewFrameSet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewFrameSet/CS/framecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewFrameSet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewFrameSet/VB/framevb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要在其中顯示連結的內容框架。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the frame in which to display the linked content. 這個範例用來顯示資料表的內容框架組的上一個範例。This example is used within the frameset of the previous example to display a table of contents. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewFrameExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewFrameExample/CS/treeviewframecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewFrameExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewFrameExample/VB/treeviewframevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定為 控制項中之節點顯示的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text displayed for the node in the control.

value.span: 為 控制項中之節點顯示的文字。

span.span: The text displayed for the node in the control.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定，或決定顯示中之節點的文字控制項。Use the property to specify or determine the text that is displayed for the node in the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性包含`null`、`get`存取子會傳回的值屬性。If the property contains `null`, the `get` accessor returns the value of the property. 如果屬性，依序包含`null`，傳回。If the property, in turn, contains `null`, is returned. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性可指定節點的文字。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the text for a node. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewFrameExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewFrameExample/CS/treeviewframecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewFrameExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewFrameExample/VB/treeviewframevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 在節點的展開和摺疊狀態之間轉換。

span.span: Alternates between the expanded and collapsed state of the node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用節點的方法以切換展開和摺疊的狀態。Use the method to alternate between an expanded and a collapsed state for the node. 例如，如果已摺疊節點，呼叫方法可展開的節點，反之亦然。For example, if the node is collapsed, calling the method expands the node, and vice versa. > [!NOTE] > 或者，您可以設定直接屬性。As an alternative, you can set the property directly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的根節點以展開和摺疊的狀態之間方法控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to alternate between an expanded and a collapsed state for the root node of a control. value.span: 節點的工具提示文字。

span.span: The ToolTip text for the node.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性可指定節點的工具提示文字。Use the property to specify the ToolTip text for the node. 當滑鼠指標的節點上方時，會顯示工具提示文字。The ToolTip text is displayed when the mouse pointer is positioned over the node. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以提供工具提示中的節點控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to provide ToolTips for the nodes in the control. span.span: Marks the starting point at which to begin tracking and saving view state changes to the node.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Value { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定非顯示值，這個值用於儲存節點相關的任何其他資料，例如用於處理回傳事件的資料。

span.span: Gets or sets a non-displayed value used to store any additional data about the node, such as data used for handling postback events.

value.span: 未顯示之節點相關的補充資料。

span.span: Supplemental data about the node that is not displayed.

value.span: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來補充儲存與節點相關聯的任何其他資料的屬性。The property is used to supplement the property by storing any additional data associated with the node. 此值不會顯示在控制項中，通常用來儲存資料處理回傳事件。This value is not displayed in the control and is commonly used to store data for handling postback events. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性包含`null`、`get`存取子會傳回的值屬性。If the property contains `null`, the `get` accessor returns the value of the property. 如果屬性，依序包含`null`，傳回。If the property, in turn, contains `null`, is returned. > [!NOTE] > 在相同層級的節點每個值必須是唯一的屬性;控制項無法區別相同層級具有相同的值的不同節點。Nodes at the same level must each have a unique value for the property; the control cannot distinguish between different nodes at the same level that have the same value. 在此案例中，如果使用者有重複的值，節點的節點，出現在第一個選取控制項。In this scenario, if the user clicks a node that has a duplicate value, the node that appears first in the control is selected. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來儲存索引鍵欄位。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to store the key field. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient/CS/treeviewpopulatenodesfromclientcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient/VB/treeviewpopulatenodesfromclientvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ValuePath As String
public: property System::String ^ ValuePath { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得從根節點至目前節點的路徑。

span.span: Gets the path from the root node to the current node.

value.span: 節點值之以分隔符號 (Delimiter) 分隔的清單，構成從根節點至目前節點的路徑。

span.span: A delimiter-separated list of node values that form a path from the root node to the current node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含表單的目前節點的路徑從根節點的節點值的分隔符號分隔清單。The property contains a delimiter-separated list of node values that form a path from the root node to the current node. 使用屬性來指定用來分隔節點值的分隔符號字元。Use the property to specify the delimiter character used to separate the node values. 這個值通常用於剖析為個別的值，或傳遞做為引數的清單方法類別。This value is commonly used when parsing the list for the individual values, or to pass as an argument to the method of the class. 中顯示的值根據控制項，以避免任何衝突變更，可能需要分隔符號字元。Depending on the value displayed in the control, the delimiter character might need to be changed to prevent any conflicts. 例如，如果您設定逗號分隔符號字元，所顯示的值不應包含任何逗號;否則，就無法正確地剖析屬性。For example, if you set the delimiter character to a comma, the displayed value should not contain any commas; otherwise, you cannot accurately parse the property. > [!NOTE] > 在相同層級的節點每個值必須是唯一的屬性;控制項無法區別相同層級具有相同的值的不同節點。Nodes at the same level must each have a unique value for the property; the control cannot distinguish between different nodes at the same level that have the same value. 在此案例中，如果使用者有重複的值，節點的節點，出現在第一個選取控制項。In this scenario, if the user clicks a node that has a duplicate value, the node that appears first in the control is selected. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何剖析屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to parse the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewPathSeparator2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewPathSeparator2/CS/treeviewpathseparatorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewPathSeparator2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewPathSeparator2/VB/treeviewpathseparatorvb.aspx#1)]
